name: Save My Robot
description:
PLEASE PLAY WITH MAXIMIZED WINDOW

-You can click controls from the top to cancel an input-

"In the year 3082, humanities growth has crawled to a halt. Our grasp of control has loosened, and with each passing day the inevitability of chaos grows more and more.  We as a species have come to an impasse, do we accept our fate and give up control? Or do we stand our ground and take back what is ours? 

Play as "Barry". A cute little robot, who also just so happens to be humanities last hope. Built with one purpose and one purpose only, take back control and find his lost professor.

Use abilities such as "Walk Forward", and "Jump!" To outsmart the torturous puzzle's created by the evil [Redacted]. Humanities last hope (and the happiness of Barry's owner) hinge on your decisions, and Barry's tiny little metal pincers.

A game created by humans, and definitely for humans, it will leave you asking yourself are we really ready for this type of Control. Join us in playing "SAVE MY ROBOT"

IGM - 10/10 the game is a masterpiece, and a powerful narrative on the destructive cycle of revenge.
